fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value: You can choose any card in your hand to act as if it was played by any other player and target any players for its effects.

fields.name: - Flipped ( <:wild:1106237191388143838> + <:orange:1106716206905438231> ):
fields.value: The effect(s) from the Reforge!d card is doubled.
